content.title: You can’t use this reason for divorce
content.reason: You must have been separated for at least {{ limitYears }} years to use this reason for divorce.
content.proceed: If you want to proceed with your application, you need to choose another reason.

content.title: Ni ellir defnyddio hwn yn rheswm dros ysgaru
content.reason: Mae’n rhaid ichi fod wedi gwahanu ers o leiaf {{ limitYears }} blwyddyn i ddefnyddio’r rheswm hwn dros ysgaru.
content.proceed: Os ydych am fwrw ymlaen gyda’ch cais, mae angen ichi ddewis rheswm arall.
